item.name: Move window to space
item.appendix: Moves window to spaces with Shift + Hyper + #.
NOTE: Requires binding F17 to "Move cursor to titlebar w/ Keyboard Maestro.
item.autogen:
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::KEY_1, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }} | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L,
KeyCode::F17, KeyCode::VK_WAIT_50MS, KeyCode::VK_MOUSEKEY_LOCK_BUTTON_LEFT, KeyCode::KEY_1, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }}, KeyCode::VK_WAIT_50MS, KeyCode::VK_MOUSEKEY_LOCK_BUTTON_LEFT,

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::KEY_2, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }} | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L,
KeyCode::F17, KeyCode::VK_WAIT_50MS, KeyCode::VK_MOUSEKEY_LOCK_BUTTON_LEFT, KeyCode::KEY_2, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }}, KeyCode::VK_WAIT_50MS, KeyCode::VK_MOUSEKEY_LOCK_BUTTON_LEFT,

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::KEY_3, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }} | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L,
KeyCode::F17, KeyCode::VK_WAIT_50MS, KeyCode::VK_MOUSEKEY_LOCK_BUTTON_LEFT, KeyCode::KEY_3, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }}, KeyCode::VK_WAIT_50MS, KeyCode::VK_MOUSEKEY_LOCK_BUTTON_LEFT,

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::KEY_4, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }} | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L,

item.name: Slate: Hyper + Comma/Period to Left/Right Brackets
item.appendix: Workaround for binding sysdiagnose shortcuts to move window between screens.
item.autogen:
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMA, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }} | ModifierFlag::NONE,
KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }}, KeyCode::VK_WAIT_50MS, KeyCode::F17

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::DOT, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }} | ModifierFlag::NONE,
KeyCode::BRACKET_RIGHT, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }}, KeyCode::VK_WAIT_50MS, KeyCode::F17

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMA, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }} | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::NONE,
KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }} | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_WAIT_100MS, KeyCode::F17

__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::DOT, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }} | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::NONE,
KeyCode::BRACKET_RIGHT, {{ MODIFIER_FLAG_HYPER }} | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_WAIT_100MS, KeyCode::F17
